Title: Beauty and the Beasts
Plot: When a student is found savagely mauled in the woods the Oz-werewolf is suspected, but when Buffy discovers that Angel is back on Earth after hundreds of years of torture and has been reduced to nothing more than a wild animal, she fears that he may be the killer.
GuestStars: Fab Filippo, John Patrick White, Danielle Weeks, Phill Lewis, Eliza Dushku
